casebody.data:
William F. HOPPE, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6597. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 20, 1933. Bart A. Riley, of Miami, Fla., for appellant. W. P. Hughes, U. S. Atty., of, Jacksonville, Fla., and B. R. Cisco, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Miami, Fla.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIBLEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
